title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server for running large language models locally with a simple API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, usable in Node.js and browsers (via proxy).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package allowing Ollama models to be used as LLM/Chat/Embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama with multi-model chat, code highlighting, and RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama with Kotlin extensions and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama providing idiomatic Ruby APIs for chat and generation.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Simple terminal UI chat client for Ollama written in Go with conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style autocomplete and chat.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation for Ollama enabling reproducible installs on NixOS and via flakes.

title: ollama-hass-addon
summary: Home Assistant add-on that runs Ollama server inside Hass.io for local voice/text automations.

title: ollama-litellm-proxy
summary: LiteLLM proxy server allowing OpenAI-compatible calls to Ollama models for drop-in replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU/CUDA support and PVC model caching.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-maintained Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ with IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI pipelines that spins up Ollama containers to test prompts or run evaluations.

title: ollama-rag-langchain
summary: Minimal RAG example combining Ollama, LangChain, and Chroma to chat over local documents.

title: ollama-model-registry
summary: Community-curated list of GGUF models tested with Ollama including performance notes.

title: ollama-rfcs
summary: Public RFC repository for proposing and discussing new Ollama features and API changes.
